means.word_mean: 1. an incurable optimist in Candide (a satire by Voltaire)

auth_sentence.content: Only a Dr. Pangloss would expect anything else.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only a Dr. Pangloss would expect anything else.

auth_sentence.content: Pangloss teaches that this is the most perfect of all possible worlds because God created it and God is perfect.

auth_sentence.content: Her title echoes Voltaire's foolish Dr. Pangloss, but she herself has not lost the hope it promises.
